activities:
Ingenico e-Commerce Solutions Inc. closely co-operates with its Belgian parent company and as a result, certain personal data may be exchanged between Ingenico e-Commerce Solutions Inc. and Ingenico e-Commerce Solutions SPRL (Belgium) and its other European affiliates.
With respect to HR data relating to its own employees, Ingenico e-Commerce Solutions Inc. will act as “data controller” and process such data for general employment related purposes (e.g. payroll, calculating days of leave, etc.).
With respect to any personal data relating to a transaction processed by the Ingenico companies that were formerly part of the Ogone group, Ingenico e-Commerce Solutions Inc. acts as “data processor” and will only process such data as per the instructions of the merchants in view of executing the transactions.
With respect to any personal data relating to customers of the Ingenico companies that were formerly part of the Ogone group, Ingenico e-Commerce Solutions Inc. will process such data on behalf of Ingenico e-Commerce Solutions SPRL or, as a data controller for customers management purposes and such other purposes as may have been communicated to the customer (as applicable).
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Employee data, customer data, end-user data; Online, offline and manually processed data
recoursemech: Ingenico e-Commerce Solutions commits to cooperate with data protection authorities located in the European Union (DPAs) and/or Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) or their authorized representatives.
